name: Delivery Express
description:
Description And Tutorial Below:
1. A 2.5D Arcade Shooter, Where You Play As a Parcel Deliverer, Whose Sole Job Is To Deliver The Parcel At Specific Locations.
2. Start Your Journey On The Top Of The Train, Shoot The Highlighted Red Delivery Boxes To Deliver The Parcel.
3. Protect Yourself and Train From Enemies From Enemy Waves By Destroying Them.

Tutorial:
1. Avoid Getting Hit By The Enemies Above You!
2. Shoot The Enemies To Destroy Them.
3. Take Care Of Your Health and Train Health By Destroying Enemies and Surviving Enemy Waves, Which Cause Damage To Us And Train.
4. Need To Deliver 5 Packages Before The End Of Level.
5. At Each Delivery Point, You Can See a Red Cube Box At Side On Ground, Need To Shoot It, To Deliver The Packages, If Missed Then You Can't.

Controls:
A-D = Left - Right
Space To Jump, Touch The Ammo Box To Refill Your Ammo!
Mouse Left Click To Shoot
Just Hit The Play Button To Start The Game!

Programming - Nabarun Roy
Game Design - Mahammad Saquib

Note:
1. While We are Proud of The Work and Time Put into The Game, We couldn't Make a Game Bug-Free and of The Exact Concept We Decided From Start, Having Only Limited Experience.

2. Currently, You Will be Looking At Bugs With 2nd Enemy Variation Not Moving or Attacking, Mouse Crosshair Texture not loaded, and Few Others.
